mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GOODS_ORDER_DETAIL_TBL D INNER JOIN GOODS_ORDER_TBL O ON D.GOODS_ORDER_CODE = O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE INNER JOIN GOODS_TBL G ON D.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE D.GOODS_ORDER_CODE = #{goodsOrderCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_TBL WHERE CART_GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode} AND CART_USER_ID = #{goodsOrderUserId}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS_TBL SET GOODS_STOCK = GOODS_STOCK - #{goodsOrderCnt} WHERE GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode}
UPDATE GOODS_TBL SET GOODS_STOCK = GOODS_STOCK + #{goodsOrderCnt} WHERE GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE) FROM GOODS_ORDER_TBL O INNER JOIN GOODS_ORDER_DETAIL_TBL D ON O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE = D.GOODS_ORDER_CODE WHERE D.GOODS_ORDER_USER_ID = #{goodsOrderUserId }

SELECT DISTINCT O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE, O.GOODS_ORDER_DATE FROM GOODS_ORDER_TBL O INNER JOIN GOODS_ORDER_DETAIL_TBL D ON O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE = D.GOODS_ORDER_CODE WHERE D.GOODS_ORDER_USER_ID = #{goodsOrderUserId } ORDER BY O.GOODS_ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE, O.GOODS_ORDER_DATE, D.GOODS_ORDER_USER_ID FROM GOODS_ORDER_TBL O INNER JOIN GOODS_ORDER_DETAIL_TBL D ON O.GOODS_ORDER_CODE = D.GOODS_ORDER_CODE ORDER BY O.GOODS_ORDER_DATE DESC
